item.title: Fed Rate-Cut Expectations Fade With Warsh Favored as Next Chair
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Treasuries fell and traders trimmed their expectations for two US interest-rate cuts in 2026 as the market-implied odds ramped up that Kevin Warsh will be nominated to lead the Federal Reserve. A slide in US government debt Friday picked up after US President Donald Trump said heâ€™d pr...
